title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 46.2 - Conditions eligible
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 46.2 - Conditions eligible

State Regulations

Conditions for which medical service is reimbursable under State aid to counties or the City of New York under the children and youth with special health care needs support services program shall be only those approved by the Bureau of Medical Rehabilitation, the Bureau of Dental Health, or the Bureau of Maternal and Child Health of the State Department of Health. Notes

York State Register May 12, 2021/Volume XLIII, Issue 19, eff. 5/12/2021

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
